children.name: link
children.label: Link
children.help_text: If no url is specified, your logo will link to your primary domain

children.name: open_in_new_tab
children.label: Open link in new tab when visitors click

children.name: max_levels
children.label: Max levels
children.help_text: Determines the number of menu tree children that can be expanded in the menu

children.name: add_language_switcher
children.label: Add language switcher
children.help_text: The language switcher will only appear if there is a multi-language variation for a page.

children.name: display_mode
children.label: Display mode
children.help_text: The language of the text in the language switcher. PageLang means the names of languages will display in the language of the page the switcher is on. Localized means the name of each language will display in that language. Hybrid is a combination of the two.

children.name: presets
children.label: Presets
children.help_text: Use presets to quickly adjust the appearance of the selected item to predefined values.

children.name: presets
children.label: Presets
children.help_text: Use presets to quickly adjust the appearance of the selected item to predefined values.
